EmailTemplate.name: Application received - not adding new dealers in area
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for applying to SunPower
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for completing our online dealer application form. At this time SunPower is not looking to add dealers in your geographic area.
Given how rapidly the solar market is developing we are continually re-evaluating our network to ensure we are meeting market needs. We will keep your application on file and contact you if a dealer opportunity becomes available in your area.
We really appreciate you taking the time to complete our online application.
Regards,
{!User.FirstName}
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693)www.sunpowercorp.com
